items.title: Bolton surrenders to face charges of sharing classified information
items.description: Donald Trump's former national security adviser is accused of using personal messaging apps and email to share sensitive information.

items.title: Thousands attend state funeral of former Kenyan Prime Minister Odinga
items.description: Mourners carrying national flags and portraits of the late leader pay their final respects at a city stadium.

items.title: Madagascar's military leader thanks Gen Z protesters as he is sworn in
items.description: Colonel Michael Randrianirina takes his oath of office in front of crowds days after seizing power.

items.title: Five takeaways from NYC mayoral debate as Mamdani and Cuomo clash
items.description: The three leading candidates for New York City mayor have been making their case to lead America's biggest city.

items.title: Zelensky to make case for missiles at White House, after Trump and Putin agree meeting
items.description: Ukraine's leader will meet Trump in Washington a day after the US president agreed to face-to-face talks with his Russian counterpart.
